name: Uchiha Clan Tee
description: Rep the most iconic clan in the shinobi world. The Uchiha symbol front and center. Clean cut, bold statement.

name: Itachi Uchiha Tee
description: The unsung hero of the Uchiha clan. Featuring Itachi's iconic Akatsuki look with his Sharingan. A must-have for any true Naruto fan.

name: Gojo Satoru Hoodie
description: Featuring the strongest sorcerer in his signature pose. Oversized fit with dropped shoulders. Limited edition print.

name: Yuji Itadori Graphic Tee
description: Yuji in his iconic fighting stance. Vintage wash finish for that worn-in feel from day one. 100% cotton.

name: Uzumaki Naruto Tee
description: The hokage himself on a clean white tee. Featuring the Uzumaki clan symbol with Naruto's signature pose. 100% cotton, relaxed fit.

name: Toji Fushiguro Tee
description: The Sorcerer Killer in his most iconic look. Premium cotton with sharp detailed print. A fan favorite.

name: Pain Akatsuki Hoodie
description: The leader of Akatsuki on a dark heavyweight hoodie. Featuring his Rinnegan eyes and piercing design. Speak the truth of the shinobi world.

name: Ryomen Sukuna Sweatshirt
description: The King of Curses on a bold oversized sweatshirt. Striking red and black design. Not for the faint hearted.
